Finance & IT is NCC’s development and delivery function for IT as well as operations development and research & innovation. We are a Nordic organization with 140+ employees working together closely under one common management. Cooperation in- and between units is key for us to deliver value to NCCs business areas, and therefore we have adapted an Agile team-based setup with focus on collaboration, people and efficient delivery and development.
   

  

 Corporate Brandfilm 2023 Master EN (creo.se)
   

  

**Your Role And Responsibilities**
 We are now looking for an IT service manager to Customer Relationship Management (CRM) tools and related services.
   

  

 In this position you will oversee all services, products, and systems in scope of responsibility. Ensuring that business demands and agreed service levels are being met.
   

  

**The Job Can Be Divided Into Five Parts**
**Life Cycle Management of your service and systems in scope**
* Ensure all documentation is in place and up to date
* Contribute to budgeting, forecasts and financial follow up
* Lifecycle management for owned assets and Cis
* Continuous improvement


**Service Delivery and Operations**
* Ensure that all processes required to deliver the service are efficiently managed and support procedures are followed
* Manage the deployment of updates, releases, patches to test and production environment through efficient change control
* Manage the support teams to ensure efficient everyday operations


**Service Development**
* Work closely with the business stakeholders to capture requirements
* Participate in development projects
* Plan and oversee transition activities – from development to production


**Service Consumer Relationships**
* Build strong customer relationships
* Continuously interact with key stakeholders
* Lead Operational Service Forums


**Management of Service Providers**
* Define and manage requirements for external suppliers including follow up on supplier performance through regular monitoring the fulfilment of service levels & license- and support agreement.


**Your profile**
 We believe that you have an Academic degree in IT and have good knowledge of work processes in large companies. You have several years of experience from the Service Managers area. You are fluent in English and one of the Nordic languages, both verbally and written. Experience in ITIL and Agile processes are also an asset.
   

  

*You will be very important for us in our strategic journey, and we think that you have:*
* Experience from working with outsourced application management.
* Able to take main responsibility, lead and drive assignments within relevant area
* Agile mindset and ITIL basic knowledge
* Experience from Service Management Processes


*To be successful in this position you*
* Have good Technical understanding
* Self-leadership but also a Team Player
* Driven at supplier Management
* Reliable
* Good Communication and Relationship building skills


**Additional Information**
 This position can be in any of our major cities in Sweden, Denmark and Norway. The position may require travelling, although we do apply a flexible way of working and strive to collaborate digitally as much as possible. In accordance with NCCs safety culture we conduct background checks on final candidates.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Please register your application and CV in English below. Selection is ongoing, so please apply as soon as possible but no later than September 15, 2024. For further information on this position, please contact Lis Karlehem, IT Competence Manager, +46706276580 or Karin Österman de Wall, HR Recruitment Specialist, +46790787210.
   

  

 Welcome with you application!
   

  

**NCC Offers**
 NCC strives to be an appealing employer, with a work environment where employees grow and experience well-being.Therefore, we offer a wide range of employee benefits. NCC offers a solid foundation of security and clear guidelines so that you know what applies to your employment. We also offer excellent opportunities for continued development and a broad range of further education options, allowing for a long career within the company.
   

  

**Build with us - together with the best colleagues in the industry!**
 At NCC, we are driven to continue developing, whether it's our construction projects or our personal expertise. Every day, we drive the industry's most exciting and complex construction projects forward in close cooperation between our employees, partners and customers. With us, you are a significant employee who contributes to the landmarks that define our cities and communities. Here, our employees take an active role in a corporate culture based on stable values and behaviors for a safe and secure workplace. Our collective expertise and diverse backgrounds make a difference.
   

  

**NCC - one of the leading companies in the Nordics**

title: Cloud Consultant
description:
***Senior Cloud Architect - Azure***




***Leading Nordic IT Consultancy Company - Sweden***




  





 Would you like the opportunity to join Sweden's fastest-growing IT organizations in the Nordics, renowned for delivering secure and cutting-edge Cloud solutions to high-profile enterprises and public entities.
 



  





 In the last 3 years they have grown their market leading business to over 500 colleagues, with significant growth and investment occurring in their cloud division.
 



  





 You will be responsible for architecting and programme managing significant multi-tenant cloud solutions for some of the most prestigious companies in Sweden. In the first instance, you will be the lead, working with two significant clients who are in the early stages of a significant cloud transformation.
 



  





**Requirements:** 




  




* 5+ years of designing public or hybrid cloud solutions.
* Fluent proficiency in Swedish (spoken and written).
* Good experience of working on or managing significant cloud migrations.



  





  





 My client offers a flexible hybrid position, recognition and rewards programs, plus a highly competitive salary.
 



  





*Thank you for your interest in this opportunity. If your application is successful, we will contact you to discuss the position in more detail within 48 hours of receiving your CV. Please assume your application has been unsuccessful if you do not hear back from us within 48 hours.*

title: Graduate Consultants for Cloud First at Accenture Technology
description:
*Are you ready to put your skills and abilities into practice? Come join Accenture in Stockholm, Malmö or Gothenburg in February 2025 and let us help you create the perfect foundation for a career within Technology consulting!*
 Tech Talent Program
   

  

 When entering Accenture Technology as a graduate consultant, you will be part of our Tech Talent Program.
   

  

  

- During the two-year Tech Talent Program, you will go through an intense learning process – with a Buddy and People Lead helping and coaching you to figure out exactly how to develop your career and skills needed to succeed.

- You will be a consultant from day one as you will be part of projects where we implement complex technology and business critical IT systems for our international clients, transforming their business.

- You will build your professional network across the organization by being part of projects, taking part in our communities and by joining our social events and parties.

 Accenture Technology Accenture Technology leverages design thinking, industry insights and the latest digital and security methodologies to help clients innovate, grow, and improve their businesses. Our expertise, capabilities and experience mean that our clients (including some of the biggest brands in the world) trust us to find the right solutions for their needs. Cloud First Accenture continues to lead in the cloud and today has a broad footprint among all the major cloud providers as well as private clouds and on-premise infrastructure. Digital and cloud technologies are changing the way our clients do business and are transforming the operating models and infrastructure at the heart of their operations. We have a clear market differentiation and leadership in New Emerging & Growth Technologies like Extended Reality, Blockchain, Application Security and leveraging our Innovation Architecture that will reflect the essence of the New Engineered Software Technologies
 **About the role**
 Whether you are a programmer guru, a digital innovator, a tech wizard, or a business problem solver, you will find an exciting career path on the cutting edge. We would love to get to know your unique blend of talents and help you explore and grow them further
   

  

*These are some of the responsibilities and tasks that you as a graduate may work with:*
- Help our customers to develop the best IT solutions by being a link between business and IT

- Work with cloud solutions like Google Cloud Platform, Microsoft Cloud Platform, Azure and Amazon Web Services

- Support in identifying customer requirements, seek client clarifications, understand compliance and apply modern cloud functionality to meet the requirements

- Work and develop solutions using program languages like Java, Python, SQL and more

- Design and build security in IT environments and cloud platforms

- Support in developing relevant solutions and requirements fitting well to our Journey to the Cloud strategy (J2C)

- Support in Change Management, help clients make best usage of the Accenture assets and best practices across the clouds

- Support project management or other management functions in projects

- Grow your professional skills within analytics, artificial intelligence, Big Data and machine learning

**Who are you?**
- You will soon receive your bachelor’s or master's degree within relevant area

- You want to join our Stockholm office in February 2025

- You have excellent written and oral presentation skills in both English and Swedish

- You are ambitious, driven, solution-oriented and motivated to start your career in a technology consulting role

**Application**
 Send your application and attach:
   

  

  

- CV

- Cover Letter

- University transcripts/grades

 Upload all files under "Upload Resume/CV". Please note that all these documents are required for a complete application.
 **Only complete applications are reviewed.** 
 Due to the summer holiday season, our response times might be a bit longer than usual. Please note that we will review your application in August and get back to you shortly after. Thank you for your interest in Accenture! If your application proceeds to the next step, you will receive an invitation to two tests that aim to measure your analytical ability as well as a personality form.
   

  

**By joining Accenture, you get**
- An end-to-end focus with clients as a trusted partner and advisor to support them from strategy to execution

- Access to a global network of experts and personal co-operation with senior high-performing colleagues and market leading clients

- A career counselor/mentor who helps you define career goals and supports you in achieving your goals and your full potential

- Personal training opportunities and a market leading career-development program. Excellent possibilities for learning and knowledge gain, resulting in a great possibility to grow as both a person and a professional.

- A very strong team culture among supportive colleagues, where team spirit and cooperation are highly valued and rewarded

- Extensive wellbeing program, that boosts your overall wellbeing, energy, and ability to work in a sustainable way.

- Opportunities to get involved in corporate citizenship initiatives, from volunteering to doing charity work, as well as Inclusion & Diversity networks.

 We look forward to receiving your application! Accenture welcomes and encourages applications from diverse backgrounds related to gender, ethnicity, culture, age etc. We provide an environment of inclusion and diversity where everyone brings distinct experience, talent, and culture to their work. We invite you to be part of this diversity!
   

  

**What you also get** 
**:** 
 Accenture IF
   

  

 Accenture IF is a community hosted by our colleagues – for our colleagues, to meet and practice sports and physical activities. We offer a wide range of activities like football, racket sports, running, sailing, golf, yoga and much more.
   

  

 To exercise sports, you enjoy in the company of others, will help you stay motivated and healthy. Join our yearly events such as a cross-country skiing bootcamp, Accenture European Championship in football or an upcoming hiking trip in the mountains. We strongly believe in work-life balance and to have fun together! Parental leave
   

  

 We want our employees to grow and achieve value in life, both in their profession and in their personal life. Accenture offer a market leading compensation for parental leave – we pay for 270 days and compensate 90% of the difference between Social Insurance Agency’s (Försäkringskassan) maximum coverage and a base pay up to 80 000 SEK/month. Sick leave/Well-being
   

  

 In need of medical treatment, we want our employees to get well supported. All Accenture employees are covered by a health insurance by Skandia - Skandia Lifeline Access. The insurance offers healthcare of physical and mental treatments, including rehabilitation. During sick leave you will get well covered, Accenture pay 80% of your salary day 2-14 and 90% day 15-90. Our “Truly Human” network aim to bring us all together – as truly human individuals. We commit to care for ourselves and others, to foster an open-minded and supporting environment. Together we can help each other to achieve our aspirations and become the best version of ourselves. One of many initiatives are “Truly Human Health Academy”, a 100-day journey filled with classes held by health- and dietician experts, workshops, and buddy challenges – to learn and reflect on well-being and daily habits. Networks
   

  

 At Accenture we offer network opportunities, for our employees to meet and share common interests. Our aim is to foster a company culture that stands for inclusion and diversity – a place for everyone in terms of cross-cultural diversity, ethnicity, gender, disability, mental health, and LGBTQI.
   

  

 Equal Employment Opportunity Statement
   

  

 All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.
   

  

 Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.

title: IT Director Nordics
description:
Are you a senior manager with experience in data centers with a strong background in IT-operations and cyber security? Would you like to play a crucial part in a company that is in an exciting phase of growth and expansion? Then, the role as IT Director Nordics at atNorth might be your next step!
 



  





**The Role** 




  





 As IT Director you will be a vital member of the leadership team. You will be responsible for developing and executing strategic IT plans that support the organization's technology, security, data, and compliance objectives. With atNorth´s certification in ISO 27001 we are looking for someone who can uphold the standard, set the foundation for an IT-first focus environment, and strategize ways to scale our IT and cybersecurity posture while delivering cutting-edge innovative solutions.
 



  





 atNorth is looking for someone who can help set the standards and create the foundation to having an IT-first focus environment, while strategizing ways to scale our IT posture, foundation and providing cutting-edge innovative solutions.
 



  





**Tasks:** 




  




* Managing and overseeing the entire IT infrastructure, IT operations, and cyber security frameworks.
* Developing and implementing short- and long-term IT strategy in alignment with the organization's goals and objectives.
* Establishing and enforcing IT and cyber security policies, systems, personnel and projects to support the strategic IT and security objectives.
* Managing and controlling the IT budget, ensuring that spending is in line with the organization's priorities and objectives, including investments in cybersecurity tools and training.
* Providing leadership, direction, and guidance to the IT team to ensure successful delivery of IT projects and services.
* Building and maintaining effective relationships with key stakeholders, such as senior executives, business unit leaders, including Data Center Operations and Project Delivery, as well as external partners to ensure alignment of goals and objectives.
* Leading and managing large-scale IT and cyber security projects, from conception to completion, ensuring they are delivered on time, within budget, and meet quality and security standards.
* Ensuring that the organization's IT systems are compliant with industry standards and regulations, such as SOC2, ISO 27001, ISO 22301, NIST, PCI, DSS, and GDPR.
* Managing the IT supply chain and all IT vendor relationships including negotiating contracts for hardware, software, and services.
* Ensuring the security, reliability, and scalability of the organization's IT systems and data.
* Providing strategic guidance on the use of emerging technologies.



  





 As an IT Director you will be part of the management team and report to the COO.
 



  





**The position can be located in Stockholm, Copenhagen, Iceland or Helsinki and will involve travel within the Nordic region.** 




  





**Is this you?** 




  





 To be successful in this role, we believe you have proven experience in a senior IT leadership role, preferably as an IT Director or equivalent. You have extensive knowledge of computer systems, networks, hardware, software and emerging technologies. You also have experience leading large-scale IT projects, managing budgets, and overseeing teams.
 



  





 We are looking for a candidate with a Bachelor's or Master’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.
 



  





 Additional certifications such as a Project Management Professional (PMP), Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP), Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL), and/or Microsoft Azure are preferred as well as regulatory experience in Data center or other critical facilities.
 



  





 Experience with regulatory compliance and standards, including ISO 27001.
 



  





 In this recruitment, your personal attributes will be of great importance! We are looking for an agile, team-focused individual, with proven professionalism, who is comfortable in a rapidly changing environment. The right person is trustworthy with confidential information, highly organized, self-motivated, has excellent communication skills, can think strategically, and works equally as well independently as with a team. Edged strives to maintain smooth operations and achieves this by empowering our people, by providing autonomy and flexibility in the way we work, by developing a habit of constant, open communication, and by creating a culture of excellence, appreciation, trust, and respect.
 



  





**Do you want to know more?** 




  





 In this process atNorth is working with Level Recruitment. To apply, please press apply. If you have any questions please contact recruitment consultant Christian Smith at +46 8-120 50 400 or Jessica Bauer at + 46 8- 120 50 422. Please note that applications will not be accepted by email. The selection process is ongoing.You are welcome to submit your application!
 



  





**About the Company** 




  





 atNorth is a leading Nordic data center services company that offers sustainable, cost-effective, scalable colocation and high-performance computing services trusted by industry-leading organizations. The business acquired leading High Performance Computing (HPC) provider, Gompute, in 2023 enabling a compelling full stack offering tailored to AI and other critical high performance workloads.
 



  





 With sustainability at its core, atNorth's data centers run on renewable energy resources and support circular economy principles. All atNorth sites leverage innovative design, power efficiency, and intelligent operations to provide long-term infrastructure and flexible colocation deployments. The tailor-made solutions enable businesses to calculate, simulate, train and visualize data workloads in an efficient, cost-optimized way.
 



  





 atNorth is headquartered in Reykjavik, Iceland and operates seven data centers in strategic locations across the Nordics, with additional sites to open in Helsinki, Finland and in Denmark in Q4 2024, as well as its tenth site ready for operation in Kouvola, Finland in 2025.
 



 For more information, visit atNorth.com or follow atNorth on LinkedIn or Facebook.

title: Technical Co-Founder (CTO)
description:
**Company Description** 




 Kladia is an innovative startup dedicated to making digital interactions effortless for non-tech users. Our platform simplifies website creation through a user-friendly, drag-and-drop interface, allowing individuals and businesses to manage their online presence with ease. From link centralization to media management, Kladia transforms digital engagement by providing all necessary tools in a single, intuitive interface.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 We are seeking a part-time (50%), mostly remote Technical Co-Founder (CTO) to join our team in Stockholm. In this role, you will play a crucial part in developing and maintaining the front-end and the back-end components of the MVP and the platform.
 



  





**[Important]** 
**Due to the unique nature of our startup, this role will not include a salary at this time** 
**and you will be compensated by company shares.** 
**A new contract will be established once we secure funding in the seed round.** 




  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain front-end components of the MVP and the platform.
* Develop and maintain back-end components of the MVP and the platform.
* Design and implement efficient and scalable server-side solutions.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop new features.
* Ensure the overall performance and reliability of the platform.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Strong proficiency in MERN Stack development.
* Strong proficiency in React.
* Extensive experience in back-end development using JavaScript, TypeScript and Node.js.
* Expertise with back-end frameworks and technologies such as Express.js and Next.js
* Proficient in NoSQL database systems like MongoDB.
* Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Vultr, or Google Cloud.
* Understanding of software development best practices, including version control, testing, and code reviews.
* Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and communicate technical ideas effectively.
* 4+ years of experience in full stack development.
* Experience with front-end development and technologies.



  





**Who You Are** 




 You thrive in startup environments and are excited about the prospect of joining an early-stage company. You are solution-oriented this means if we face a problem, you own it and find the best solution to solve it. You are a natural problem solver, and ready to take on multiple responsibilities. Flexibility is crucial, as is the willingness to work overtime when necessary. This role is unpaid until we secure funding in the seed round, so you should be financially self-sufficient in the interim.
 



  





**What Kladia Can Offer** 



* Become Kladia's Co-Founder!
* Become employee number 2!
* Exposure to cutting-edge technologies.
* Exposure to the latest productivity tools.
* A high-tech, modern startup environment focused on simplicity and user experience.
* An opportunity to shape the future of website creation for non-tech users.
* A significant role in the company with potential for future leadership as CTO.
* Company stock as a reward for your contributions as co-founder vesting.



  





**Culture at Kladia** 




 We value creativity, collaboration, and a can-do attitude. At Kladia, we believe that every team member's contribution is vital to our success and the positive impact we aim to make on the world.
 



  





**Join Us as a Co-Founder** 




 As a Technical Co-Founder, you will not just be another employee—you will be a pivotal part of the leadership team. This is a unique opportunity to have a significant impact on the direction of the company and your career from its earliest stages. You will be instrumental in bringing our vision to life and directly contributing to the success of Kladia. If you have an entrepreneurial spirit and are passionate about technology and innovation, we want to hear from you.
 



  





 Join Kladia and be part of an exciting journey to revolutionize how non-tech users interact with the digital world. Use the Easy Apply button to apply now and help us build the future of website creation!

title: Solutions Architect
description:
**TalentCrew söker Solution Architect till Novatrox** 




  





*När du går till jobbet, har du då ambitionen att vara med och göra en förändring? Vill du skapa förutsättningar för verksamheter att utvecklas och förbättras, samtidigt som du själv utvecklas och växer som IT-arkitekt? Vi söker lösningsarkitekter som vill växa.* 




  





 Vi tror att du har lätt för att sätta dig in i och förstå olika verksamheter. Du har ett sinne för att ta fram lösningar som tillgodoser behov och strategier samt har en förmåga att göra nödvändiga prioriteringar och kompromisser för att balansera olika kvalitetskrav. Du förstår vikten av att kommunicera och förmedla resultatet av ditt arbete på ett sätt så att dina mottagare förstår.
 



  





 Vi söker dig som har
 


* arbetat som lösningsarkitekt eller liknande.
* erfarenhet av arkitektur och utveckling av komplexa integrationslösningar.
* erfarenhet av molnplattform såsom Azure eller AWS.
* goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.
* vanan att arbeta i ett agilt team.



  





**Om tjänsten som lösningsarkitekt** 




 Som lösningsarkitekt på Novatrox arbetar du i en nyckelroll tillsammans med våra kunder. Du arbetar med att förstå verksamhetens krav och behov för att omsätta dem till den lösningsdesign som är mest värdefull för verksamheten.
 



  





 I rollen som lösningsarkitekt arbetar du tillsammans med andra erfarna arkitekter, både som bollplank och i leveranser. För oss är det viktigt att dela erfarenhet och hjälpa varandra att utvecklas samt hjälpa varandra med leveranser hos kunder.
 



  





**Varför ska du jobba som lösningsarkitekt på Novatrox?** 




 Som lösningsarkitekt hos oss kommer du att jobba mot marknadsledande bolag och tillsammans med våra vassa kollegor dela erfarenhet och kunskap som är svår att matcha. Vi tror att nyckeln till en bra företagskultur är att samla duktiga människor och säkerställa att de har kul ihop - samtidigt som det ges möjlighet till kunskapsutbyte och kompetenshöjande aktiviteter. På så sätt får vi glada specialistkonsulter som trivs och ger sitt yttersta. Både internt i bolaget och ute hos kund.
 



  





 Vi är ett litet bolag med kontor centralt beläget som vi delar med våra systerbolag och moderbolaget Time People Group. Tillsammans är vi ca 180 medarbetare. Mixen ger dig både den personliga tillhörigheten samtidigt som du blir en del av den stora gemenskapen – där möjligheterna till spännande uppdrag, kompetensutveckling och roliga samarbeten är oändliga.
 



  





***Om Novatrox***




*Novatrox är konsultbolaget som kan arkitektur och AI. Vi är ett gäng härliga kollegor och har en rolig arbetsplats där din utveckling är prioriterad. Vi har en gemensam passion för arkitektur, agilt ledarskap och artificiell intelligens och med en stark vilja att utveckla oss och våra kunder - som finns inom, allt från multinationella techbolag till offentlig sektor, bank & försäkring och retail. Vi jobbar aktivt och långsiktigt med förändring för att vara en arbetsplats som verkar för att minimera klimatavtrycken och erbjuda en arbetsmiljö där alla trivs, utvecklas och kan vara sig själva.* 




  





**Novatrox samarbetar med TalentCrew.** 




 Vänligen skicka in din ansökan till menal.suliman@talentcrew.se. Du är varmt väkommen att höra av dig till Menal om du har frågor eller funderingar. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig.

title: Systemadministratör till Vattenfall
description:
Har du en avslutad gymnasieutbildning samt erfarenhet av redovisnings- och controlling-processer? Har du även mycket goda kunskaper i SAP? Behörighetsexpert till Vattenfall, Solna. Ett perfekt jobb för dig som har erfarenhet sedan tidigare och är redo för nästa utmaning! Skicka in din ansökan redan idag då vi arbetar med löpande urval!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Vattenfall Business Services Nordic AB
 



  

**Plats :**
 Solna
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Vattenfall söker nu en konsult för rollen som
   

**Application Expert**
 –
   

**Authorisations**
 i det internationella Authorization & Compliance-teamet, inom Financial Systems, inom Finance Business Support (FBS). Du kommer att vara en av ca 12 personer i teamet och rapportera till chefen för Authorization & Compliance.
   

 Applikationsexperten för behörigheter hjälper till att uppnå målen för Authorization & Compliance-teamet och fungerar som ambassadör för Finance Systems mission och strategi.
 


  


 Behörighet och Compliance arbetar för ett effektivt behörighets- och behörighetsstöd med relevanta verktyg och stödjer compliance-aktiviteter främst inom SAP ERP-området, med stöd av Vattenfalls IAM-system (identity management). Vi strävar efter en harmoniserad leverans i alla regioner och ett starkt gränsöverskridande samarbete.
 


  


  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter och ansvarsområden:**



  

  
* Arbeta med behörighets-/myndighetsadministrativa uppgifter över regiongränserna för Vattenfall, partners och andra intressenter. Det handlar om att stödja organisationen och hantera ärenden om åtkomstförfrågningar och felsök i system som omfattas av t.ex. IAM (Vattenfalls Identity management system), SAP (ERP Classic och S4), SRM etc
  
* Agera gränssnitt/SPOC mot affärsområden, IT, övriga stabsfunktioner och outsourcingleverantör och därigenom bidra till goda relationer och god service gentemot intressenter och kunder
  
* Stöd med övervakning och uppföljning av revisionsresultat, risk och regelefterlevnad inom ramen för teamet och FBS.
  
* Samarbeta med riskägare för att minska risken, främst i det finansiella omfånget, till exempel genom att hantera SoD-risker (Segregation of Duty) och andra kritiska åtkomster
  
* Stöd vid verksamhetsförändringar, t.ex. etablering av nya företag, avveckling av företag, fusioner etc
  
* Delta i utvecklingsprojekt inom FBS eller koncernövergripande/tvärvetenskapliga projekt och driva uppdrag självständigt
  
* Stödja arbetet mot harmoniserade och standardiserade auktorisationskoncept och processer genom projekt och förbättringar. Ge processförbättringsidéer till processexperter/processspecialister. Sträva efter att automatisera repetitiva och lågvärdeskapande aktiviteter
  
* Stöd i att definiera/beskriva krav/behov inom området behörighetshantering, felsökning och utveckling, implementering och test av ändringsbegäran
  
* Stöd med framtagning av underlag för processer och verktyg för teamet, FBS och andra kunder och intressenter inom Vattenfall.
  
* Utföra tjänster med hög kvalitet och punktlighet i leveransen enligt gemensamma processer, policyer och riktlinjer
  


  


 Vissa resor kommer att krävas i arbetet.
   




**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har en avslutad svensk gymnasial utbildning
  
* 2-4 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med SAP
  
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med behörigheter och identifiera ledningssystem
  
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med affärssystem
  
* Erfarenhet eller kunskap om finansiella processer
  
* Erfarenhet från processutvecklingsarbete och projektarbete
  
* Flytande svenska och engelska (både muntligt och skriftligt)
  


  


  

**Det är meriterande om du har**



  

  
* Relevant universitetsexamen (t.ex. i företagsekonomi, redovisning, controlling) eller jämförbar annan utbildning
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Förmåga att ta ägarskap och visa engagemang samt att kunna arbeta självständigt
  
* Förmåga att arbeta i ett team och att arbeta proaktivt och lösningsorienterat
  
* Förmåga att arbeta i stora och komplexa organisationer och att hantera interna och externa gränssnitt effektivt
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Clara Nyquist eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på sth5@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15106440

title: Applikationskonsult
description:
**Your PEEPS** 

 är en företagsgrupp bestående av tre bolag där vi i huvudsak bedriver konsultverksamhet. Det som särskiljer oss är att vi har en nära relation till vår uppdragsgivare och erbjuder våra tjänster baserat på varje enskilt behov - inte utifrån en standardiserad mall.
 




  





***PEEPS***
*– definitionen är – (eng) people – Ofta använt för att referera informellt till en grupp människor som är vänner eller kollegor. Vi är helt enkelt vännen/kollegan som ställer upp. Med ledord som Flexibel, Uppriktig och Närvarande så strävar vi på PEEPS alltid efter att ge kunden det allra bästa.* 




  





 I Your PEEPS koncern erbjuder vi konsulttjänster i två olika verksamhetsgrenar:
 


* **PEEPS Consulting** 
 har konsulter som arbetar inom HR, Workforce Management och verksamhetsledning, exempelvis interim lönechef eller projektledning.
* **PEEPS Payroll & Accounting** 
 tillhandahåller redovisnings- och lönekonsulter, med erfarenhet av ett flertal systemlösningar.



  





 Nu önskar vi att utöka teamet med ytterligare en
 **Applikationskonsult!** 




  





 Som Applikationskonsult på PEEPS kommer du bland annat att arbeta i uppdrag mot kund i WFM systemet Quinyx. Du hjälper våra kunder med allt från löpande support till implementation och är en proaktiv rådgivare i arbetssätt och systemmöjligheter. Du identifierar, analyserar och prioriterar användarbehov samt omsätter dessa till lösningar utefter våra kunders verksamhet och behov. Vi erbjuder dig en lärorik och varierande vardag med olika uppdrag, arbetsplatser och möjlighet till att arbeta självständigt samtidigt som du tillhör ett team.
 



  





**Vi söker dig** 
 som har erfarenhet som systemspecialist och superuser i tidrapportering och schemaläggningssystem. Du har ett stort intresse för IT, system, systemutveckling och digitalisering av processer.
 



**I ditt arbete** 
 är du lösningsorienterad, självgående och är van vid att självständigt driva dina processer och ansvara för egna kunder. Som person är du är strukturerad, noggrann och social. Du är en god kommunikatör med god språkkunskap i både svenska och engelska.
 



  





**Krav:** 



* Systemvana inom tidrapportering och schemaläggningsapplikation



  





**Högt meriterande:** 



* Erfarenhet som systemspecialist och superuser i Quinyx
* Löneadministration och förstående för hela flödet



  





**Vi erbjuder dig:** 



* En tjänst som ger dig möjlighet att jobba med Quinyx inom olika branscher
* Ett team som tycker att det är viktigt att man ska trivas på arbetet och en organisation där det är nära till besluten
* Att arbeta på ett företag under tillväxt vilket ger möjlighet till varierande arbetsuppgifter och utveckling med goda möjligheter till kompetensutveckling
* Sunda värderingar där vi eftersträvar en bra balans mellan arbets- och privatliv, möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån samt flexibla arbetstider
* Friskvårdsbidrag



  





 På PEEPS arbetar vi primärt på distans. Du utgår hemifrån och resor i tjänsten förekommer, primärt ut till kunder i olika uppdrag.
 



 Tjänsten som Applikationskonsult gäller tillsvidare med provanställning 6 månader och omfattar 50 -100%
 

 beroende på vilken tjänstgöringsgrad du önskar och vad som passar i ditt livspussel.
 



  






 Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta vår rekryteringsansvarige Sanna Carlsson, Sanna@yourpeeps.se.
 




  





 Urval och intervjuer sker löpande och tjänsten önskas att tillsättas så snart som möjligt, så skicka in din ansökan idag!
 







 Med det hälsar vi dig
 **varmt välkommen till PEEPS!**

title: Fullstackutvecklare till Tre
description:
Teknikavdelningen på Tre har ungefär 300 medarbetare och IT Customer Management tillhör IT Development-organisationen. Teamet består av 28 medarbetare och har ansvar för utveckling av CRM, kundtjänstapplikationer och RPA. Med hjälp av agila metoder bedriver vi mjukvaruutveckling av hög kvalitet i en kultur där förändring och förbättring är en självklar del av vardagen.
   

  

 Den närmaste tiden har vi fokus på att ta över Contact Center-system som idag ägs av verksamheten. Vi är på väg in i en spännande period där vi etablerar ny arkitektur och nya arbetsmetoder för implementationer och integrationer, vilket kommer att möjliggöra effektiva system.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som fullstackutvecklare ansvarar du för koden i integrationen av Contact Center-plattformarna (Genesys cloud och Zendesk) och ser till att de befintliga applikationerna moderniseras såväl som att bygga nya från grunden. Du kommer att vara med i hela systemutvecklingskedjan – från analys till implementation. Fokuset kan lätt skifta från detaljer i koden till att lyfta blicken och analysera helhetsperspektivet i den tekniska lösningen. Du arbetar tätt tillsammans med vår IT-arkitekt samt utvecklare och övriga i ditt team. Men även i nära samarbete med stakeholders och beställare hos kundservice som har gedigen kunskap av systemen.
   

  

 Vi moderniserar våra system och går från Python till att utveckla i Java och TypeScript/JavaScript, NextJS och React på plattformar som kubernetes, Vercel och Contentful.
   

  

**Du kommer se fram emot att**
* vara med och driva arkitektresan för Contact Center-systemen och ta tekniskt ansvar i våra integrationsimplementationer
* jobba nära kundupplevelsen där du får bidra med din kunskap
* bli del av en lärande kultur där vi erbjuder dig en utmanande miljö där du lär dig nya saker varje dag
* vara en del av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser enligt Great Place To Work samt att vi är topprankade hos Karriärföretagen av IT-Young Professionals
* tillhöra en arbetsgivare som vill bidra till att kvinnor vill välja och stanna kvar inom teknikbranschen, vi är stolta partners till Women in Tech och Tjejer Kodar


**Lite mer om dig**
 Du är nyfiken på och har en förmåga att förstå affärsnyttan och värdet av det du är med och utvecklar. Du tycker om att ta eget ansvar och det ligger i din natur att agera proaktivt genom att göra det lilla extra för dig och dina kollegor. Då det ingår många kontaktytor ser vi att du är en kommunikativ person som kan svenska och engelska, och som trivs i dialogen med verksamheten.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen har du mångårig arbetslivserfarenhet av backendutveckling med Java samt att är du trygg i din frontendutveckling med React och Typescript. Vidare har du tidigare erfarenhet av tekniska förflyttningar. Det är en bonus om du är bekant med Genesys Cloud eller Zendesk.
   

  

**Din ansökan**
 Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via denna annons och kommer hålla intervjuer löpande. Personligt brev behövs inte, men vi vill gärna att du svarar på de frågor vi ställt nedan i samband med att du söker.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Teknisk Systemförvaltare - Identiteter
description:
*Vi söker dig som har djup kunskap och erfarenhet av området identiteter och som vill arbeta på en myndighet under Försvarsdepartementet som skapar samhällsnytta genom att forska för en säkrare värld.*
**Om tjänsten**
 I rollen som teknisk systemförvaltare arbetar du med operativ drift och förvaltning samt utvecklig av plattformarna inom området. Detta sker i samarbete med resten av teamet. Arbetsuppgifterna innebär även att vara delaktig i olika uppdrag där du arbetar med att se till att en kvalitativ driftmiljö med hög tillgänglighet tillhandahålls. Du blir en del av en dedikerad Windowsgrupp som kompletterar varandra kunskapsmässigt och samarbetar nära varandra i det dagliga arbetet.
   

  

  

**Om enheten**
 FOI finns på fyra platser: Stockholm-Kista, Umeå, Stockholm-Grindsjön och Linköping. Som teknisk systemförvaltare för identiteter kommer du vara en del av FOI:s IT-enhet. IT-enheten består av 35 medarbetare och vi räknar med att växa kraftigt de kommande åren. Medarbetarna finns på alla myndighetens fyra orter, de flesta i Kista. IT-enheten ingår i avdelningen Forskningsstöd som ansvarar för att strategiskt planera, driva och operativt genomföra myndighetsövergripande och verksamhetsgemensamma uppgifter inom avdelningens kompetensområden. På avdelningen återfinns myndighetens verksamheter gällande juridik, inköp, redovisning, kommunikation, IT, personal och fastighet. På avdelningen finns även myndighetens funktioner för till exempel arkiv, bibliotek, rapportadministration, registratur, resor, tryckeri samt miljöfrågor. Läs gärna mer om vad vi gör: https://www.foi.se/om-foi/organisation/forskningsstod.html
   

  

  

**Har du den kompetensprofil vi behöver**
 ?
   

  

  

**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* En för tjänsten relevant utbildning eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet som vi bedömer likvärdig
* Minst 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet av operativ drift och utveckling av AD, PKI och Powershell som du har under de senaste sju åren
* Bred och djup teknisk kompetens inom området med goda kunskaper om bakomliggande teorier och principer för området
* God förmåga att uttrycka dig på svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


**Det Är Meriterande Om Du Har**
* Arbetslivserfarenhet av ADFS
* Arbetslivserfarenhet av IAM-lösningar
* Arbetat i en blandad miljö tillsammans med Linux
* Övriga angränsande teknikområden som FOI bedömer som relevanta


 Som person är du trygg och stabil. Du flexibel och trivs att arbeta i en föränderlig verksamhet. Du är lösningsorienterad, tar initiativ och har en god förmåga att själv driva ditt arbete framåt mot uppställda mål. Du har dessutom god samarbetsförmåga och du delar gärna med dig av dina kunskaper till dina kollegor.
   

  

  

**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
 FOI erbjuder en unik arbetsplats, där du får möjlighet att arbeta med det som är viktigt för både totalförsvaret och hela samhället. FOI är en statlig myndighet under Försvarsdepartementet och är ett av Europas ledande forskningsinstitut inom försvar och säkerhet. Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning som kan komma att inledas med sex månaders provanställning.
   

  

 Vi arbetar medvetet för en god arbetsmiljö med en bra balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Utöver detta erbjuder vi en rad förmåner. Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss: https://www.foi.se/jobba-hos-oss.html
   

  

  

**Vill du vara med och söka svaren för en säkrare värld?**
 Välkommen med din ansökan i form av CV och personligt brev via ansökningsknappen senast den 20 september!
   

  

 För mer information om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta sektionschef Daniel Åkerstedt. Fackliga företrädare är Fredrik Ringblom (Saco-S) och Magnus Lindström (OFR/S – ST) Samtliga nås på 08-555 030 00.
   

  

 Då anställningen är placerad i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585). Inför säkerhetsprövning efterfrågas vidimerade kopior på de utbildningar och tjänstgöringsintyg som är relevanta för tjänsten.
   

  

 Då vi är en myndighet betraktas inlämnade ansökningshandlingar som allmän handling och kan på begäran lämnas ut till utomstående enligt offentlighets- och sekretesslagen.
   

  

 Erbjudanden från rekryteringsföretag undanbedes.

title: Nätverkstestare
description:
**Vill du vara en del av ett duktigt team som bidrar till samhällets säkerhet genom att säkerställa kvaliteten på några av världens mest säkra IT-produkter?** 




  





 Vill du vara en del av ett duktigt team som bidrar till samhällets säkerhet genom att säkerställa kvaliteten på några av världens mest säkra IT-produkter? Om du värderar noggrannhet, hög teknisk kompetens och engagerade kollegor där ditt arbete spelar en avgörande roll – då är denna position som Testare perfekt för dig.
 



  





**Om tjänsten** 




  





 Företaget växer och vi vill nu utöka vårt väl fungerande QA team med ytterligare en duktig nätverkstekniker. Du kommer antingen från en liknande roll på ett annat bolag eller är nyfiken på att utforska en mer avancerad nätverksroll. I den här positionen kommer du att vara central i verifieringen av företagets kryptoprodukter. Ditt arbete kommer att sträcka sig från projektets start till leverans och du kommer att ingå i ett tvärfunktionellt utvecklingsteam.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter inkluderar:** 




  




* Underhåll och drift av vår nätverksmiljö.
* Skapa, utföra och underhålla manuella nätverkstester.
* Teknisk rapportering och dokumentation.



  





**Vem vi söker** 




  





 Du besitter nätverkskunskap kring VPN, brandväggar, switchar och routrar, samt du har även lite erfarenhet av mjukvaruverifiering. Erfarenhet av Linux ser vi som en stor fördel. Men framförallt är du en passionerad nätverkstekniker med öga för detaljer.
 



  





 En anställning hos oss är placerad i säkerhetsklass och säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer därför att genomföras vidanställning i enlighet med 3 kap. säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585).

title: Technical Delivery Director
description:
**Description**
**About The Role**
 We’re looking for a highly technical, proactive and people-smart Delivery Director with expertise in the software services industry to join our team in Stockholm or Gothenburg. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for managing complex transformation programs, projects, multiple workstreams and work with both local delivery team and delivery team globally.
   

  

 In this role, you will be accountable for the overall project delivery, client satisfaction and management of expectations while ensuring that the work is on strategy, on time and within budget. You will be working alongside globally renowned and award-winning design, development and technology teams who are passionate about what they do and how they do it. You will play a key role in building strong business and technology relationships, take a ‘hands on’ approach to define, deliver and drive a culture of continuous improvement.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Oversee end-to-end client delivery from initiation through the entire project lifecycle, ensuring successful delivery in line with EPAM processes
* Manage client relationships and expectations, representing delivery at the governance level
* Coordinate multiple activity streams and clients, ensuring seamless delivery across all aspects, including finance, sourcing, implementation and business outcomes
* Work closely with multi-disciplined teams of product owners, architects, engineers and quality assurance to drive estimates, delivery plans and retrospectives
* Proactively identify and manage engagement risks, escalating major issues early on
* Participate in business development efforts for both existing and new clients, continuously identifying new opportunities
* Engage in the entire pre-sales cycle, prepare client proposals, define implementation and design and present solution architecture and delivery statements of work


**Requirements**
* Proven experience in leading and managing teams, including hiring, mentoring and performance management with the ability to provide strategic direction, set goals and ensure the team's efforts align with the organization's data strategy
* Proven track record of successfully managing multiple complex projects simultaneously from initiation to delivery whilst prioritize tasks effectively
* Experience in building and leading geographically distributed delivery teams, including experience in working with customer's distributed team and defining right target operating model
* Solid understanding of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and their related services
* Hands-on experience in technology and software engineering practices with ability to supervise and suggest competitive technical decisions and assure a winning mix of delivery practices applied on the project
* Ability to present delivery strategies and progress reports to executive leadership
* Self-motivated, reliable, able to multitask and work in a fast-paced environment, with a strong focus on meeting deadlines


**Nice to have**
* Experience of delivering large scale ecommerce projects using composable architecture; e.g. commerce tools
* Experience of delivering data projects and proficiency in data management concepts, including data governance, data quality, data integration and data lifecycle management


**Our Benefits Include**
* Competitive compensation depending on experience and skills
* Opportunity to work on leading edge platforms, working in a fast-paced, agile, software engineering culture
* Knowledge-sharing with colleagues from EPAM's global tech communities
* Unlimited access to LinkedIn learning solutions
* Regular performance feedback and salary reviews
* Opportunities for professional growth
* EPAM Employee Stock Purchase Plan (ESPP) (subject to certain eligibility requirements)
* Some of these benefits may be available only after you have passed your probationary period

title: SAP Integration Lead.
description:
**SAP Integration Lead** 




**SAP Project System (PS** 









**Complete Job Description with role and responsibili** 




**Fixed Term / Permanent – Fixed Team – 6 months or 12 months** 




**Hybrid / WFH – Hybrid – have to be Office in Stockholm or Lund when required** 




**Language preference - English** 




**Is Subcon allowed ? – Subcon allowed, provided we need vendor consent to move candidate after 6 months to client .** 









 We are currently seeking a SAP Integration Lead.
 



 Location: The role is based in Stockholm/hybrid.
 







 Required skills
 



 SAP BTP
 



 SAP Integration Suite
 







 Preferred skills
 



 Seeburger
 



 Biztalk
 



 Greenfield projects
 







 Purpose of role and key responsibilities
 



 You will be our senior integration designer and advisor. As such, you will lead the work to define our future integration architecture, design and operations, in close cooperation with business and IT stakeholders, as well as with SAP and our implementation partner You are a strong advocate and gatekeeper for our principles: standardization, harmonization & simplification.
 



 Specific tasks, skills and behaviours includes:
 



 • Co-exist architecture and design. You drive the migration from, and decommissioning of, our legacy platforms; together with representatives from our partners.
 



 • You guide other projects and initiatives towards our target architecture and design. And support with knowledge, guidelines, frameworks etc.
 



 • Responsible for the operations of our integration platform.
 



 • Guidelines/instructions are developed and maintained. Deviations from agreed design principles and ways of working are lifted.
 



 • Strong communication and interpersonal skills, as Integration Lead you will work closely with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
 



 • Upon completion of our transformation program, you will continue to be part of the SAP CoE supporting the continuous business development and improvement journey.
 







 Qualifications, experiences and personal characteristics
 



 We are looking for you who will be an active member of our team and add value to the program by using your SAP, technology, and business competence.
 







 To be successful in this role, you:
 



 • Have minimum 6 years of experience in a similar senior role within integration platforms, with a strong understanding of SAP’s newer integration capabilities within Integration Suite and BTP.
 



 Experience from our current integration platforms, Biztalk and Seeburger is strong advantage.
 



 • A similarly strong competence in integration concepts, methodologies and patterns.
 



 • Have been involved in large SAP implementations, preferably greenfield projects and are familiar with SAP’s solution landscape as well as best practices, methods and tools from SAP.
 



 • Contribute with drive, leadership and a positive attitude. You speak up and have opinions, backed up by guiding principles, target architecture, program playbook etc.
 



 • Take decisions and contribute to decision making.
 



 • Have a Master of Science university degree (technical faculty or similar) or equivalent through work experience.
 



 • Are fluent in spoken and written English

title: Project Manager at GreenIron
description:
***GreenIron is on the exciting journey of reducing the climate footprint of the world’s metal, mining and manufacturing industries. We are now recruiting a curious and business-oriented Project Manager who wants to be a key player in the journey of creating long-term societal value with a focus on sustainable value creation. Is that you?***
*Our vision is to become the global metals and mining sector’s most respected and innovative CO2-free company by leading the industry transformation from a linear to a circular economy. As Project Manager you will play a key role in the establishment of our production facilities worldwide. You and your colleges will ensure that GreenIron builds efficient facilities both in Sweden and globally and creates conditions for sustainable profitability. As we are a green company with sustainability at our core, it is highly advantageous if you have an interest in and experience with environmental and sustainability issues.*
 You will be based in Stockholm and be part of the project team. You will facilitate effective communication, collaboration and integration among various stakeholder to ensure project progress. As the role has a global scope, international travel will be part of the work. You will report to Chief Project Officer Johan Löw, and work in close collaboration with other colleagues within the company.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Ensure all projects adhere to high standards of quality and workplace safety
* Lead, coordinate and oversee the assembly and construction of GreenIron facilities, ensuring timely and efficient completion.
* Manage and drive multiple projects across various stages, from conceptualization through execution, to achieve project goals
* Effectively coordinate internal teams and external partners to align resources and achieve project milestones
* Prioritize tasks and manage both time and budget constraints to deliver projects on schedule within budget
* Contribute to the development and refinement of project management methodologies, including the creation of a comprehensive project handbook


 Background and experience
   

  

* Master’s degree in mechanical engineering or industrial engineering
* 5-10 years of experience working in industry or industrial projects.
* A team player who can share knowledge and experiences to collectively arrive at the best solution
* Fluent in English and Swedish. Knowledge in more languages is an advantage


 As a person you are curious, collaborative and business oriented. You have a humble attitude as well as a strong sense of commitment and drive. You are a skilled communicator and relationship builder with the ability to create engagement with clients, colleagues and other stakeholders. You thrive in fast paced, changing and entrepreneurial environments where through your role you truly can make an impact and drive change.
   

  

 If this sounds like your kind of challenge, apply today by submitting your CV and cover letter!
   

  

 Application:
   

  

 We look forward to your application, which you can email to hr@greeniron.se Please write “Application Project Manager ” in the subject line of the email. In the application, you need to submit two documents. One document with your updated CV and another document that clearly answers the following questions:
   

  

 – Why are you interested in GreenIron and the role of Project Manager?
   

  

 – How can you contribute to GreenIron in the role of Project Manager?
   

  

 We look forward to your application and appreciate if it is in PDF format. The position may be filled before the application deadline as selection is ongoing. Therefore, apply as soon as possible, but no later than 2024-09-10. We kindly ask to avoid direct contact with staffing and recruitment companies as well as sellers of additional job advertisements.

title: Configuration & IT Asset Manager | SEB, Solna
description:
Do you like to bring order and structure to a complex IT Asset environment? We might just have the right opportunity for you!
   

  

 SEB is a leading financial services group, and at the same time, one of the largest IT employers in the Nordics. Banking is changing rapidly, and we are proud of our reputation for being entrepreneurial and innovative in the face of change. Our brilliant techies work hard to future proof SEB’s digital architecture and IT infrastructure. Does that sound like an interesting working environment for you?
   

  

 SEB Development Solution & Infrastructure (DSI) is responsible for developing and managing the IT infrastructure within SEB. Within DSI you find the Cross Area Function with several areas of expertise. One of these is the responsibility of coordinating and structure SEB’s Configuration & IT Asset management. We are now looking for expanding that area with an additional team member.
   

  

 Configuration & IT Asset management is a vital part of ensuring control of the IT landscape and securing its lifecycle management. Cyber Security and foremost customer experience is depending on that SEBs’ IT infrastructure is up to date. It ensures that we meet our customers high demands and the regulators requirements.
   

  

**About the role:**
 We are looking for an analytical and driven individual who will ensure our maturity of our license and software management. We have an extensive catalogue of licenses and softwares that all need to be ensured are being managed on required level. Your responsibility will be to secure data, manage the catalogue and provide support towards license managers and software owners. You will become part of the experienced Configuration & IT Asset management team consistent of today three other experts in the field.
   

  

 We believe that managing this data will require a solid understanding of data analytics and a keen interest in developing our expertise in this area. Strong interpersonal and communication skills are also essential, as you will be directly supporting a large number of license managers and software owners.
   

  

**To thrive in this role, we believe you have:**
* Strong knowledge of IT software management and DORA understanding
* A couple of years or more experience of working as an IT asset analyst or data analyst
* Relevant ITSM tool experience and a good understanding of handling licencing agreements is also beneficial
* Ability to support both strategic agendas and process development for the area will be needed.
* Great communication and interpersonal skills to ensure that the changes needed are committed by all responsible units.
* Fluent in both English and Swedish
* Plus to possess IAITAM Certification, such as CHAMP, CSAM, and CITAM


**What we offer:**
* Hybrid workplace
* Innovative company in forefront of technology
* Friendly and welcoming culture
* Attractive compensation and benefits
* Long-term stability


 We are still developing this area of expertise within Cross Area Function at DSI, so the ability to develop the role over time is significant.
   

  

**Ready to take the next step on your career journey?**
 Don't hesitate to take the opportunity to explore a potential development in your career. This is a new role within SEB and has great potential of being developed with you.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 22nd of September 2024. If you have any questions about the position, please contact the recruiting manager Niclas Petersén Odin Niclas.petersen-odin@seb.se.
   

  

 Learn more about working at SEB here: www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Senior Android Engineer
description:
**Hej, Truecaller is calling you from Stockholm, Sweden! Ready to pick up?** 




  





 Our goal is to make communication smarter, safer, and more efficient, all while building trust everywhere. We're all about bringing you smart services with a big social impact, keeping you safe from fraud, harassment, scam calls or messages, so you can focus on the conversations that matter.
 


* Top 20 most downloaded apps globally, and world’s #1 caller ID and spam-blocking service for Android and iOS, with extensive AI capabilities, with more than
 **400 million** 
 active users per month.
* Founded in 2009, listed on Nasdaq OMX Stockholm and is categorized as a Large Cap. Our focus on innovation, operational excellence, sustainable growth, and collaboration has resulted in consistently high profitability and strong EBITDA margins.
* A team of 400 people from ~35 different nationalities spread across our headquarters in Stockholm and offices in Bangalore, Mumbai, Gurgaon, and Tel Aviv with high ambitions.



  





**We at the Search team** 
 , focus on enhancing our users’ communication experience by providing them with the most relevant identity information and state-of-the-art spam protection. Our mission is to identify the person/ company calling before the user picks up the call, identify spammers, block unwanted calls, and provide more information about the calling numbers.
 



  





**As a Senior Android Engineer in the Search Team** 
 , you will be writing quality, maintainable code in a team of Android Engineers, working with Search, assets, and spam features as a core part of our product. You will collaborate with the team, follow best practices and make sure our engineering goals are met. You will be reviewing code mainly for the Search Team but also for others whenever shared ownership happens.
 



  





**The impact you will create:** 



* Write simple, understandable, testable, and efficient code with a focus on solid technical stability and great user experience.
* Drive technical improvement by applying software craftsmanship in everyday work as well as by identifying and executing larger refactoring/improvement initiatives.
* Contribute to the implementation of complex features and design work.
* Being part of cross-team technical projects
* Participate in and contribute to the team’s Agile practices.
* Implement unit tests within the team’s responsibility area.
* Take responsibility for maintaining high engineering standards, and commitment to the product.
* Mentoring others and sharing knowledge within the team.



  





**What you bring in:** 



* 5+ years of experience in Android development
* Strong knowledge of the Android SDK (minimum 5+ years of experience)
* Familiarity with RESTful APIs
* Sound knowledge of Kotlin, Coroutines and Dependency injection
* Ability to develop features while conducting unit tests .
* Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
* Fluent in English, in speaking and writing
* Experience in working with Agile methodologies



  





**It would be great if you also have:** 



* Strong knowledge of Android UI design principles, patterns, and best practices as well as an eye for design
* Experience of Jetpack Compose



  





 Life at Truecaller - Behind the code: https://www.instagram.com/lifeattruecaller/
 



 Sounds like your dream job?
 



  





**We will fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate, so please send your application as soon as possible. As part of the recruitment process, we will conduct a background check.** 




  





**This position is based in Stockholm, Sweden.** 




  





**We only accept applications in English.** 




  





**What we offer:** 



* **A smart, talented, and agile team:** 
 An international team where ~35 nationalities are working together in several locations and time zones with a learning, sharing, and fun environment.
* **A great compensation package:** 
 Competitive salary, 30 days of paid vacation, flexible working hours, private health insurance, parental leave top-up, pension contribution, Udemy membership to keep learning and improving, and free gym membership.
* **Great tech tools:** 
 Pick the computer and phone you most fancy within our budget ranges.
* **Do it your way** 
 : We work in the office on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays with flexibility on the other days.
* **Office life:** 
 Enjoy your days with a wide range of yummy snacks and beverages, and have fun in our playroom! As well as in our exciting company parties and team activities such as Lab days, Running team, and Geek lunch!



  





**Come as you are:** 




 Truecaller is diverse, equal, and inclusive. We need a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences to keep building our great products. No matter where you are based, which language you speak, your accent, race, religion, color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, etc.
 **All those things make you who you are, and that’s why we would love to meet you**

title: Network Manager
description:
Om tjänsten
   

  

**You would like to make a difference and work together with us on our big target to get fossil free within one generation?**
 The Network department is delivering secure and stable network services to the Vattenfall Group. Covering data, voice and video services in LAN and WAN environments. To fulfill regulations most services are delivered by a strong, well established international group of about 70 internal employees. Previously sourced LAN services are being taken into internal deliveries.
   

  

 The department closely collaborates with parts of the Vattenfall IT organization focusing on Nuclear Services and the Cloud Based Services that also include network deliveries. An extension of the client and services (YIN) delivery into the Wind business with on- and offshore wind farms is currently being developed.
   

  

 The Client and Services (YINN) Department has a structure of N4 level teams who are jointly creating the services to be consumed by predominately applications (e.g. ERP systems, field services, sales systems) or end users (e.g. supporting mobile working / working from Home). Vattenfall applies agile methodologies and as well waterfall approaches.
   

  

 Currently the Network Organisation is transforming its delivery model to a software defined delivery with high focus on further automation. This is going to change the way of working, management style as well as the organizational setup.
   

  

**Your tasks and Resbonsibilities will be:**
 You will lead this change and lay the foundation for the new network delivery model. Applying an adaptive leadership and management style to ensure secure, stable and cost efficient delivery of network services. By this enabling Vattenfall’s business to quickly adapt to changing market conditions and driving our vision of working for fossil freedom.
   

  

 You will be part of the client and services (YIN) management team that covers in addition the areas of workplace computing, service desk, identity and collaboration, and service management.
   

  

 We are looking for an experienced and inspiring manager with a sound background in Network technologies (f.i. WAN, LAN, SSE, SASE, SAD. Multidomain Network Automation).
   

  

 Experience in transitioning from a command line based administration to a fully software defined network is a plus.
   

  

**Location**
 Berlin, Hamburg, Amsterdam, Stockholm, Katowice or Gliwice
   

  

 Din bakgrund
   

  

**Your profile**
* A relevant university degree and preferably at least 5 years of managerial experience managerial experience in a similar role, in complex, international environment
* Preferably you have technical background and broad experience in managing complex network and security solutions for large enterprise environments on an architecture level
* Genuine interest in leadership, capable of motivating and inspiring team members to achieve results
* A pragmatic and solution-oriented style of working under given economic conditions
* Highly performance oriented, service oriented and flexible mindset
* Strong & visible leadership, excellent communication skills, problem solving and collaboration skills ensuring effective collaboration with business leaders/stakeholders/ vendors and within VIT
* An ability to build and maintain trustful working relationships to stakeholders, peers, external partners, Vattenfall colleagues and own staff
* A passion to motivate, energize and drive performance from the team Demonstrated ability to work independently, to take initiative and to follow-through
* Perfect command of the English language is needed in order to be successful in this job
* Vattenfall currently expects employees to be in the office 2 days per week
* Open and flexibel for travelling since frequent travel is required


 Mer information
   

  

**Our offer**
 Good remuneration, a challenging and international work environment, and the possibility to work with some of the best in the field. You will be working in interdisciplinary teams and you can always count on support from committed colleagues. We offer attractive employment conditions and opportunities for personal and professional development.
   

  

**More Information**
 We welcome your application in English, no later than,
 **September the 6th. 2024** 
 . We kindly request that you do not send applications by any means other than via our website as we cannot guarantee that we will be able to process applications that are not made via our website.
   

  

 For additional specific technical information about this vacancy announcement please contact
 **Dr. Ulf Arne Stolzke (ulf.stolzke@vattenfall.de)** 
 . For more information about the recruitment process you are welcome to contact our recruiter
 **Marius Gläßge** 
 via phone:
 **+49 30 8182 2004** 
 or via mail:
 **marius.glaessge@vattenfall.de.**
 Trade union representatives in Sweden (IT) are Sofi Wadström (Akademikerna), Inger Strandberg (Unionen), Christer Gustafsson (Ledarna), Lennart Bengtsson (SEKO). To get in contact with the representatives, please call Vattenfall´s switchboard +46 8 739 50 00.
   

  

 At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to build a more profitable and attractive company and we strive to be good role model regarding diversity. Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, transgender identity or expression, religion or other belief, disability or sexual orientation.
   

  

 We look forward to your application in English with a cover letter, curriculum vitae and relevant certificates or references. Please apply directly via our application link. Please note that we will only start the selection process after the application period has expired.
   

  

 Since Vattenfall is part of the Swedish critical infrastructure many of our positions are security classed. If this position is security classed the final candidates can be subject to a Security Vetting process, according to Swedish legislation.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
 Om oss
   

  

 Vattenfall is a European energy company with approximately 21 000 employees. For more than 100 years we have electrified industries, supplied energy to people’s homes and modernized our way of living through innovation and cooperation. We now want to make fossil-free living possible within one generation. To be able to reach this ambitious goal we are looking for talented individuals who, in addition to their passion for their own role, also have strong team spirit and want to contribute to supporting a meaningful corporate mission.

title: Dynamics 365 Functional consultant/Solution Architect – SCM
description:
Microsoft Dynamics 365 F&O Functional Solution Consultant/Architect - Supply Chain
 



  





 Stockholm Malmø Gøteborg - It is a prerequisite that Swedish can be written and spoken at a professional level.
 



  





 One of the largest Microsoft Dynamics partners in Europe is setting up a business unit in Sweden and is currently seeking Dynamics consultants and project managers for their first project in the country.
 



  





 The company focuses on the process industry, having developed ISV solutions for Pharma, Life Science, Chemicals, and Food & Beverage on top of Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations. They are firmly rooted in these industries and come with an extensive catalog of references.
 



  





 You will be part of the company from the beginning and can have significant influence in building and growing the business in Sweden, while also shaping the company culture alongside your colleagues.
 



  





 The company is already established in Sweden with other subsidiaries, ensuring that support functions are already in place for a smooth start-up. This also provides the opportunity to have colleagues and various social events from day one.
 



  





  





 The company is headquartered in Europe, is a member of the Inner Circle for Microsoft Business Applications and has won Partner of the Year for Western Europe. They have more than 670 Dynamics customers and over 650 Dynamics consultants.
 



  





**About the job:** 




 You will be involved from the start of the projects - From pre-sales to being part of the implementation team, where you will have significant influence on the solution.
 



  





 As a Consultant/Functional Solution Architect, your primary task will be to take professional responsibility for solutions within SCM. You will be a key figure in the project's development and implementation.
 



  





 Your role will involve close collaboration with the customer and other consultants on the project to create the best solutions. You will work alongside the best consultants in the industry within the process industry and be part of a team with high expertise.
 



  





**Who are you?** 




 You are an experienced and visionary professional with a solid understanding of Microsoft Dynamics 365, especially within the production & SCM modules, preferably within the process industry.
 



  





 With at least 5 years of experience as a consultant within D365FO / AX, you have a strong background in implementing large IT solutions and are comfortable navigating complex projects.
 



  





 Your ability to work across cultures and build strong relationships will be key to success in this position.
 



  





**Want to hear more?** 




 If you are up for an informal chat about the job, feel free to contact Easter Hay Att. Kim Mikkelsen at phone +45 4122 0032 / kimi@easterhay.dk.

title: Juniora konsulter | Business- och People Consulting | Stockholm Göteborg Malmö
description:
Vill du arbeta som managementkonsult med globala möjligheter och ny teknik i en inkluderande kultur? Vi söker individer med olika bakgrunder och infallsvinklar som vill vara med och rådge våra kunder kring förbättringar och risker i den snabba utveckling och förändring som de befinner sig i. EY Consulting erbjuder dig som nyutexaminerad en strukturerad metod för utbildning och coachning genom vårt unika SPOT ON-program. Genom SPOT ON ges du möjlighet att uppnå din fulla potential, stöttas i en säker inlärningsmiljö, vara del av utvecklande interna projekt och roller samtidigt som du bygger ett internationellt nätverk. Vi söker nu dig som är färdig med din masterexamen under 2024/2025 och som triggas av möjligheten att som managementkonsult hjälpa våra kunder.
   

  

  
   

  

**Din roll som konsult**
 Inom Business- och People Consulting erbjuder vi våra kunder ett brett utbud av tjänster, nedan följer exempel på områden som du kan få möjlighet att arbeta med:
   

  

* Transformation och förändringsledning av affärsområde, funktion eller process
* Utveckling av ekonomi- och finansfunktionen, bland annat genom projekt med fokus på finansiell strategi och planering, lönsamhetsanalys, digitalisering och analytics
* Hela försörjningskedjan (end-to-end supply chain) och den operativa verksamheten, genom projekt kopplade till exempelvis planering, produktion, inköp samt kapital och infrastruktur.
* Revision av risker inom finansiellt kritiska IT-system och certifieringar för best practices inom ledning och testning av interna kontroller
* Genom strategiska utvärderingar, förbättra affärsprocesser och interna kontroller för att stötta våra kunder att koordinera sina risker och affärsmål, att förbättra sina strategier för att hantera risker och bygga agila och riskmedvetna organisationer
* Stötta våra kunder att förvalta sina medarbetare genom att arbeta med människan i fokus, innovation och digitalisering, samordning av organisation och ledning samt hur HR funktionen kan stötta företagets strategiska agenda
  

  


  
   

  

**Kvalifikationer för tjänsten**
* Relevant master-, magisterexamen eller högre är meriterande (från olika typer av utbildningar såsom: ekonomer, civilingenjörer, systemvetare, jurister, beteendevetare, informationssäkerhet, datavetenskap, elektronik eller motsvarande). Vid kandidatexamen ställs högre krav på nedanstående punkter
* Framstående akademiska meriter
